page.title: 06RELIGIONS IN DONCASTER
page.content: THERE ARE A GREAT NUMBER OF PLACES OF WORSHIP AND MANY DENOMINATIONS WITHIN OUR AREA OF STUDY,RANGING FROM CHURCH OF ENGLAND,TO ROMAN CATHOLIC,TO THE UNITED REFORM CHURCH,TO A SIKH TEMPLE. THE MAJORITY OF THE PLACES OF WORSHIP SERVE THE MAIN CHRISTIAN FAITHS WHILST,AS HAS BEEN MENTIONED,MINOR RELIGIONS ARE ALSO CATERED FOR.THE FOLLOWING FAITHS HAVE CHURCHES,CHAPELS ETC.WHICH CAN BE FOUND WITHIN THE AREA OF THE D BLOCK :{UNITED REFORM,CHURCH} {OF ENGLAND,ROMAN CATHOLIC,NATIONAL {SPIRITUALIST,JEHOVAH'S WITNESS, {PENTECOSTAL,SIKH,BAPTIST,METHODIST, {CHURCH OF JESUS CHRIST OF LATTER DAY {SAINTS,EVANGELICAL,SALVATION ARMY. } THE FAITHS WITH THE GREATEST NUMBER OF PLACES OF WORSHIP IN THE D BLOCK ARE CHURCH OF ENGLAND,METHODIST AND ROMAN CATHOLIC.
